query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sync_conflicts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  sync_job_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  entity_type ENUM('campaign', 'ad_group', 'keyword', 'product_target') NOT NULL,
  entity_id VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  entity_name VARCHAR(500),
  conflict_type ENUM('data_mismatch', 'missing_local', 'missing_remote', 'status_conflict') NOT NULL,
  local_data JSON,
  remote_data JSON,
  conflict_fields JSON,
  suggested_resolution ENUM('use_local', 'use_remote', 'merge', 'manual') DEFAULT 'use_remote',
  resolution_status ENUM('pending', 'resolved', 'ignored') DEFAULT 'pending',
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolved_by INT,
  resolution_notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  INDEX idx_sync_job (sync_job_id),
  INDEX idx_account (account_id),
  INDEX idx_resolution_status (resolution_status)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sync_conflicts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  sync_job_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  entity_type ENUM('campaign', 'ad_group', 'keyword', 'product_target') NOT NULL,
  entity_id VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  entity_name VARCHAR(500),
  conflict_type ENUM('data_mismatch', 'missing_local', 'missing_remote', 'status_conflict') NOT NULL,
  local_data JSON,
  remote_data JSON,
  conflict_fields JSON,
  suggested_resolution ENUM('use_local', 'use_remote', 'merge', 'manual') DEFAULT 'use_remote',
  resolution_status ENUM('pending', 'resolved', 'ignored') DEFAULT 'pending',
  resolved_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  resolved_by INT,
  resolution_notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  INDEX idx_sync_job (sync_job_id),
  INDEX idx_account (account_id),
  INDEX idx_resolution_status (resolution_status)
);
